title.rendered: How Defense In Depth Will Save Your Business From Cybersecurity Breaches and Data Loss – Webinar Recording

content.rendered:
How Defense In Depth Will Save Your Business From Cybersecurity Breaches and Data Loss - Recording.

Cyber threats are more sophisticated than ever, so relying on a single line of defense is not enough to protect your business.

Join us to hear the true stories of businesses that caught and stopped cyberattacks right in their tracks.

Defense in Depth—layers multiple security measures to protect your organization from cybersecurity breaches and data loss.

We will be answering…
“What is Defense in Depth and how can I achieve it?”
“What is redundancy, and how could it strengthen our resiliency?”
“What is the NIST Cybersecurity Framework (CSF) and how can it guide us to reduce risk?”

Whether you’re an IT leader or a business executive, this webinar will equip you with actionable insights to enhance your organization’s cybersecurity strategy. Learn how a multi-layered defense approach can be your strongest ally in the battle against cyber threats.

Watch this on-demand webinar and take the first step toward securing your business!

About our speakers:
Ted Hulsy, CRO for Snap Tech IT and a technology veteran of over two decades will be joined by Chuck Wiley, IT Director for Snap Tech IT and a Defense in Depth expert who will guide you through the layers of reducing risk and increasing resiliency for your business.

excerpt.rendered:
Explore strategic ways to get more out of Microsoft Teams. Learn how to organize your Teams experience to improve communication across your company helping you to become a Microsoft Teams power user.

Watch this on-demand webinar to learn the Top 10 Tips to Get the Most Out of Microsoft Teams.
